name: Zentralverband Kälte Klima Wärmepumpen
goal: ZVKKW represents the heat-pump, air-conditioning and refrigeration contractors/craftsmen, industry and wholesales in Germany. Founded in the year 2009, our membership is composed of 30 member companies and national associations across Germany, realising a turnover of over 12 Billion Euros and employing more than 42,000 people in Germany.
